author: daxian-dbw
body:
Update the docs for `beta.1` release.
Revert the build workarounds to fix #3741

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Win7 packages are not available in beta.1 release due to a downlevel API set issue (#3747), so README.md still points to the alpha.18 win7 packages.

title: Update docs for beta.1 release
